articles.author: Dev Chatterjee
articles.title: JSW Steel in talks to buy Australian coal mine for up to $1 bn valuation - Business Standard
articles.description: JSW Steel plans to increase its capacity to 50 million tonnes per annum by 2030
articles.content: JSW Steel plans to increase its capacity to 50 million tonnes per annum by 2030, using acquisitions to secure raw material for its target. The company is scouting for high-quality coal mines in Austr… [+46 chars]
